extendedInfo.description: By popular demand, the Active Lockscreen Dev. Team has designed the Spring Theme to enhance your use of the Active Lockscreen app. The Spring Theme for Active Lockscreen is available for download now! Designed and developed by Active Lockscreen, the Spring Theme will improve your Active Lockscreen byâ¢	Saving battery power and providing longer battery lifeâ¢	Providing a pleasing visual experience while using Active Lockscreenâ¢	Supplying matching buttons, zippers and graphicsThe Active Lockscreen offers users many features and benefitsâ¢	Fast and easy launch of any application â ideal when you are on the Goâ¢	Display your favorite gallery pictures, Facebook feeds and other apps of your choice while your phone is lockedâ¢	Set up shortcuts to any application you want or just let the appâs smart algorithm set your commonly used shortcuts for you â¢	Easy access with one clickâ¢	Reduce clicks to call a contact, launch an app, play a game, browse the web, play music, get Facebook updates or just unlock your phone â¢	Individual optimization to serve your needs (learns what you need from your previous actions) â¢	Set up frequent contacts for easy calling even when you are on the goâ¢	Call your recent contacts or open the dialerâ¢	Launch your recently used apps â¢	Send Text messages through your SMS Inbox or any other text app such as WhatsApp, Skype, Viber, Email, Gmail, Twitter or LinkedIn â¢	Launch the camera or any picture and graphics related apps installed on your phone such as Instagram, Mobli, Food, Adobe Photoshop ExpressThe Active Lockscreen is easy to use and is the best app for unlocking your phone.- all you need to do is place your finger on the lockscreen ring and drag it to the relevant action or shortcut. Enjoy our new background themes with matching graphics! Important:1. This is not a standalone app, you need to download the LATEST version of the Active Lockscreen app in order to apply this theme.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: App is great but only request is to have widgets and access to certain apps without unlocking the device!!!
reviews.author: Prince Ntim

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: The buttons need to be more crisp and they should look HD.
reviews.author: Walid Isar

reviews.title: Nice one!
reviews.comment: HTC explorer. Good app but need to be more smooth and lively:)
reviews.author: chetan ks

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Just started using this app but love it so far and it is free!!
reviews.author: Karen Norris

reviews.title: Hmm Its a keeper!
reviews.comment: Ive tested tons of locksreen apps but kept coming back to this one. Tons of free active themes to really customize your lockscreen. And unlike some apps this one really does protect your devise with a pattern/passcode. Tiny glitch when screen times out on its on. Almost like the lockscreen blinks a few times. Only request is for widgets or access to certain apps without actually unlocking the device. But hey the app is still a keeper. Thanks. Keep up the good work. Team android. Gotta love customization :)
reviews.author: Tonette Wilkes

reviews.title: Flows well
reviews.comment: I like how I can move to the icons in this one. It just flows nicely to my apps.
reviews.author: Lioness Luvsu

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love it. .best lock screen I\'ve used. Only thing is the Facebook plug in just brings me to the Facebook page in the app store?
reviews.author: Tanya C

reviews.title: Beautiful.
reviews.comment: And works perfectly on my Galaxy S II
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super
reviews.comment: Really pretty and calming background...app runs without any problems. Great job!!
reviews.author: Diandra Abbott

reviews.title: Awesome! Makes my phone tons better!
reviews.comment: Just got it and so far so great! I don\'t know what I\'d do without it already!! I love that it doesn\'t look HD, I like and need a softer grainy look and I hate HD. Maybe someday there could be an option for choosing either one. Good work, love love love!!!
reviews.author: Linda Redmond

reviews.title: Gutes Programm
reviews.comment: Praktische App f\303\274r schnellen Zugriff direkt aus der Tastensperre. Wenn man eigene Hintergr\303\274nde verwenden k\303\266nnte g\303\244be es 5 Sterne.

reviews.title: perfect !
reviews.comment: it works great and i also love that i can put any kind of picture on my plugin !

reviews.title: Like it
reviews.comment: Nice theme like it sooo much!
